languages.text: {n}Вы начинаете петь, больше ориентируясь на чувства, чем на ритм или мотив. Иногда Ирлиэт меняет течение мелодии, подталкивая вас вплетать в нее все новые и новые образы. Вскоре вас окутывает теплое чувство, сравнимое с крепкими объятиями. И вы замечаете, что лицо Ирлиэт становится чуть мягче обычного.{/n}

{n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы начинаете петь, больше ориентируясь на чувства, чем на ритм или мотив. Иногда Ирлиэт меняет течение мелодии, подталкивая вас вплетать в нее все новые и новые образы. Вскоре вас окутывает теплое чувство, сравнимое с крепкими объятиями. И вы замечаете, что лицо Ирлиэт становится чуть мягче обычного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You start singing, guided more by your own emotions than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and again, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add new patterns. A warm feeling soon settles over you, reminiscent of a tight embrace. And as it does, you notice Yrliet's expression soften slightly.{/n}

{n}You start singing, guided more by your own emotions than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and again, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add new patterns. A warm feeling soon settles over you, reminiscent of a tight embrace. And as it does, you notice Yrliet's expression soften slightly.{/n}

{n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens."

{n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens."

{n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

{n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous commencez à chanter, en vous laissant guider par vos émotions plus que par un rythme ou un motif précis. De temps en temps, Yrliet fait varier la mélodie pour vous encourager à ajouter quelque chose de nouveau à la chanson. Une sensation de chaleur vous enveloppe comme une étreinte affectueuse et l'expression de la xénos s'adoucit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous commencez à chanter, en vous laissant guider par vos émotions plus que par un rythme ou un motif précis. De temps en temps, Yrliet fait varier la mélodie pour vous encourager à ajouter quelque chose de nouveau à la chanson. Une sensation de chaleur vous enveloppe comme une étreinte affectueuse et l'expression de la xénos s'adoucit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Empiezas a cantar, más guiad{mf|o|a} por tus propias emociones que por un ritmo o tema específico. De vez en cuando, Yrliet cambia el ritmo de la melodía, animándote a añadir algo nuevo a la canción. Una sensación cálida que recuerda a un suave abrazo se extiende en tu interior, y la expresión de Yrliet se suaviza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Empiezas a cantar, más guiad{mf|o|a} por tus propias emociones que por un ritmo o tema específico. De vez en cuando, Yrliet cambia el ritmo de la melodía, animándote a añadir algo nuevo a la canción. Una sensación cálida que recuerda a un suave abrazo se extiende en tu interior, y la expresión de Yrliet se suaviza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你开始唱了起来，你的歌声没有任何特定的节奏或主题，完全由你自己的情感主导。伊莉耶特时不时会改变旋律的流动，鼓励你在歌曲中添加某些新的东西。歌声中温暖的感觉，仿佛温柔的拥抱环绕着你，伊莉耶特的表情也变得更加柔和。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你开始唱了起来，你的歌声没有任何特定的节奏或主题，完全由你自己的情感主导。伊莉耶特时不时会改变旋律的流动，鼓励你在歌曲中添加某些新的东西。歌声中温暖的感觉，仿佛温柔的拥抱环绕着你，伊莉耶特的表情也变得更加柔和。{/n}

languages.text: {n}「あなたは歌い始めた。特定のリズムやモチーフよりも、自分の感情に導かれて。時折、ユリエットはメロディーの流れを変え、歌に何か新しいものを加えるように促す。優しい抱擁のような温かい気持ちがあなたを包み込み、ユリエットの表情が和らいだ」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「あなたは歌い始めた。特定のリズムやモチーフよりも、自分の感情に導かれて。時折、ユリエットはメロディーの流れを変え、歌に何か新しいものを加えるように促す。優しい抱擁のような温かい気持ちがあなたを包み込み、ユリエットの表情が和らいだ」{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du beginnst zu singen, mehr von deiner eigenen Emotion geleitet denn von einem bestimmten Rhythmus oder Motiv. Hin und wieder verändert Yrliet den Fluss der Melodie, ermutigt dich, etwas Neues zu dem Lied hinzuzufügen. Ein warmes Gefühl legt sich über dich wie eine sanfte Umarmung, und Yrliets Miene wird weicher.{/n}

Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şarkı söylemeye başlıyor, herhangi spesifik bir ritmi veya motifi değil de kendi duygularını takip ediyorsun. Yrliet, arada sırada melodinin akışını değiştiriyor ve sana şarkıya yeni bir şeyler eklemen için yol açıyor. İçini nazik bir kucaklamaya benzer, sıcak bir his sarıyor ve Yrliet'in yüz ifadesi yumuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You begin to sing, guided by your own emotion more than any specific rhythm or motif. Every now and then, Yrliet changes the flow of the melody, encouraging you to add something new to the song. A warm feeling settles over you like a gentle embrace, and Yrliet's expression softens.{/n}
